titleStmt.title: July 18, 1671 on a tryal before the Lord Chief Justice Hales, between Nathaniel and John Letten, plaintiffs, and Leonar Moresco, widow defendant ...

notesStmt.note: Title and other title information from first lines of text.
A request to London merchants for comments on the case -- cf. p. [1] at end.
"Pray let your Answer be left at Mr. Benjamin Billingsley's, a Bookseller, at the Sign of the Printing Press on the South-west Walk of the Royal Exchange." -- p. [1] at end.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
